title: Turing Internship Scheme Opportunities and Data Study Groups
summary: Turing has launched a new round of the Turing Internship Network (TIN), with 27 internship opportunities.
body:
Turing has launched a new round of the Turing Internship Network (TIN), with 27 internship opportunities being offered by our TIN partners and collaborators in areas of research spanning from data science and responsible AI, to digital twins, to graph machine learning, to synthetic data generation.

For this call, we have expanded our internship offering to include our joint programme connecting TIN with our Data Study Groups (DSG). Interns will be placed at environment and sustainability charities and NGOs where they will develop a challenge for a DSG which will take place in early 2023.
